Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: We are an Italian-English family with high expectations on both espresso and filter coffee - having purchased several machines which did not last in the past, we think this machine is EXCELLENT - still going strong after a couple of years, I also bought one for my Mum.  Customers who complained about the filter jug dribbling - at first I did not know what they meant, but if you fill the jug right up to the top for a lot of filter coffee, then yes, it strangely dribbles, but otherwise if you are making up to 4/5 mugs it is fine.  Otherwise the machine makes excellent espresso and using it every day for cappuccino (filtering water in advance) it is still going very strong.  Worth nothing that the anti-scale filter is for the filter coffee side only, there is no equivalent on the espresso side, so worth using filtered water on this side for long life (although I am often lazy and don't, and it still works fine).  Of particular note is the excellent cappuccino frother - really easy to take off and rinse after each use, without having to dismantle all pieces - the best and most practical design I have seen yet.  This machine is well-worth the money.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: I bought this machine just under 2 years ago with high hopes - it appears to be a great combination with filter and espresso in one.  The making of filter coffee is excellent with an easy front-loading water tank.  I prefer paper filters - much more hygienic and less likely to "taste" the coffee.  Coffee tastes good and the hot plate keeps the brewed coffee very hot - a big improvement on my last machine.I only wish the espresso process was as efficient.  The design doesn't allow you to prepare the milk whilst you're making the espresso - it's either one or the other so either the milk or the espresso is cooling whilst you're doing the other part.  The milk steamer nozzle is very short and awkwardly placed and really only allows a small container under.The steamer stopped working about 6 months ago - simply fizzled out, despite my having cleaned all the nozzles after every use.  There is no help whatsoever on the DeLonghi website so I tried everything I could think to unblock the tube - it sputtered into intermittent life a few times but has now stopped working completely.  The steamer is inside the machine so there is no access and it cannot be dismantled to clean (assuming that is the problem).  End of story and very disappointing that this should happen to a machine that's less than 2 years old - I'm now left with an expensive filter coffee maker. My advice - look elsewhere.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: This is a nice machine and I've been very happy with the basics. The drip brew is pretty quick and the tank is very easy to fill without risk of overflowing. The swing out section for the coffee filter and water makes day to day operation simple. The espresso maker works well and I find it very handy for a quick cup. I haven't tried using the pods as regular ground coffee is simple enough to use with it.On the downside, I find the jug extremely prone to spillage when pouring. Unlike most coffee pots, this does not have a curved spout. This leads to me often spilling water when filling up the machine or pouring coffee. After quite a bit of use, I'm getting the hang of holding it at a slight angle so it doesn't spill quite as much!The one big disappointment I found was the milk frother. It isn't very powerful, so takes a very long time to correctly froth and heat the milk. What I also find strange about this part is that I cannot heat the water for an espresso and steam for the milk frother at the same time. This means making a latte or cappuccino very tricky unless I'm missing something! You have to make one and then wait for the other part to heat up before use. So you end up with luke warm milk or a stewed espresso.For the money, I'd have expected a bit more on that front. But if you want a sturdy, well made machine and don't worry about milk frothing it is a decent buy.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: I've just replaced my coffee maker with this one. The instruction booklet makes it look somewhat complicated to use, but that is not the case. The machine is very easy to use and makes brilliant and HOT coffee.The espresso feature uses about a third of the ground coffee of my old machine and the taste is great.Filling it with water is really easy, especially the espresso tank.All the parts of the machine are very accessible with no 'fiddly' bits.A top rate machine at very reasonable price, good value for money.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)

The pot side seems to work pretty nicely too - it takes size 4 filter papers, but comes with about 5 of them so you can get going right away.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: Overall I am very pleased with the product, which was bought as a gift.As this was our first home coffee machine it did take some getting used to, such as buying the right type of coffee. First attempts were marred by using normal ground coffee, which produced a very lack lustre coffee. Eventually we tried a ground coffee specifically designed for these type of machines.Both functions of the machine works well. The filter side keeps the coffee nice and warm, although it would have been nice if the machine had a permanent washable filter rather than need filter papers.The expresso side produces a good cup of coffee, although it does not automatically cut off after the first shot is produced. When producing double shots of coffee we found best results by switching the machine back to warming mode once the OK light had gone off. My partner also has found that putting hot water in the water tank makes the coffee warmer, although I have not used it enough myself to make a judgement on that.Overall I think the machine is very good for its price and it's dual function has proved extremely useful.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: Can make coffee well and is very versatile for the price, but you must know what you're doing with this.Firstly, you'll need to refill the water every 3-4 medium sized coffee cups, also it will give you double and single pod filters, please use the correct one for that order. If you use a double and don't put 2 pods in then you will get awful weak coffee, that said be sure to give the pods a shake before putting them into handle press for best results.The milk frother works best with full fat milk, and the nossle isn't very long so don't use a tall cup when frothing. The heating plate on the coffee pot is good, but again read the instructions before you try it or it might not work out as you migh expect.All in all, a quite professional piece for the price, as long as you know what you're doing, this can serve a great cup of coffee.Good points: Professional style, Works well, Versatile, great value.Bad points: Small water tank, small frother nozzle, not ideal for novice use.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: War zunächst sehr zufrieden mit der Maschine, ausgezeichneter Kaffee und gute Crema. Nach ca. 1 Jahr bereits Probleme (vermutlich mit der Pumpe), da der Kaffee nicht mehr richtig durch den Siebträger lief und teilweise nur tröpfelte. Dachte zuerst, es liegt am zu fein gemahlenen Kaffee, aber nachdem wir verschiedene Mahlgrade ausprobiert haben ist das definitiv nicht der Grund. Das Ersatzgerät hat jetzt nach 2,5 Jahren genau dieselben Probleme, mittlerweise kommt auch beim gröbsten gemahlenen Pulver nichts mehr durch. Amazon ist nach 2 Jahren aus der Garantie raus, und nach Anruf bei DeLonghi haben auch die die Hände von sich gestreckt, für Kombi-Kaffeemaschinen gäbe es nur die gesetzliche Frist von zwei Jahren - also bleibt nur Einschicken zum Kundendienst, Überprüfung und Reparatur würde aber mehr kosten als die Maschine selbst. Von daher Fall für den Elektroschrott. Nie wieder.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: Nachdem das baugleiche Vorgängermodell nach etlichen Jahren seinen Dienst verweigerte, habe ich mich, trotz der bekannten Fehler wieder für die BCO 410 entschieden. Schade das DeLonghi es über die Jahre nicht geschafft hat alle(auch von mehreren Kunden) kritisierten Fehler auszuräumen. Die Tropfschale unter der Espressoseite hat jetzt einen Füllstandsanzeiger, das ist gut. Aber eine kleckerfreie Kanne zu konstruieren, scheint unvermindert unmöglich zu sein.Ansonsten erfüllt die Maschine ihre Aufgaben. Der Kaffe ist i.O. die Qualität des Espressos ist ebenfalls gut,reicht aber nicht ganz an "große" Maschinen heran. (Ist wohl in diesem Preissegment auch nicht zu erwarten.)

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: There were good and bad comments about this product, so I wasn't sure who to believe. Somehow I figured those who were unhappy with the taste of the espresso had made a mistake or something. Well, no. It's indeed awful - impossible to obtain an acceptable espresso, what you get is more or less what Senseo machines do. Which is incredible since those machines work under a pressure of not even 2 bars.Let me precise I used the right filter (the 1-cup one) and as a last attempt I even tried using a ridiculous amount of water. Didn't help at all. I ended up returning the item and asking for refund.Some argue that you know what to expect for this price. I don't agree: if it's actually impossible to make a decent espresso machine at such a small price, then don't do it. Whatever the price, there's no point buying a coffee machine that can't make your coffee.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: Hatte die BCO410 bereits 2012 gekauft, die leider, nach der ein oder andere Macke, nach schon 2 Jahren den Geist aufgegeben hat. Da ich das Konzept und die Optik eigentlich sehr ansprechend finde, habe ich sie nochmal gekauft.Auffällig ist z.B., dass beim Aufschäumen von Milch Wasser aus dem Siebträger tropft. Die Qualität der Getränke und Verarbeitung der Maschine ist sicher nicht perfekt und sehr lange wird diese Maschine sicher nicht halten. Für den Preis erhält man meiner Meinung jedoch nichts Besseres. Im Handel findet man doppelt so teure Geräte, die deutlich schlechter verarbeitet sind.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: Ich bestellte die Kombimaschine als Weihnachtsgeschenk für meinen Vater, da er in den letzten Jahren eine Vorliebe für Espresso entwickelt hat und seine bis dato genutzte Kaffeemaschine langsam aber sicher den Geist aufgab.Das Paket kam nach 2-3 Tagen sehr ordentlich verpackt an; alles war in ausreichend Luftpolsterfolie eingewickelt sodass nichts zu Bruch ging (gehen konnte).Die Maschine ist nun seit knapp einem Jahr in Betrieb und es gibt nach wie vor nichts zu meckern.In Sachen Verarbeitungsqualität, Bedienungsfreundlichkeit und natürlich dem Geschmack des Kaffees / Espressos lässt die Kombimaschine BCO 410 von DeLonghi (für uns) keine Wünsche offen.Ich kann jedem, der keine Unsummen ausgeben möchte, dieses Produkt wärmstens empfehlen und würde sie definitiv wieder kaufen!

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: We had to replace our current machine which we have had for years now wearing out.  we purched this as a present between us for christmas. Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: It is a bit bigger than I expected and takes up a lot of kitchen work surface, but is easy to use and produces excellent coffee every time.Having tried a variety of options, I can highly recommend getting a grinder and buying whole-beans rather than the pods or grounds. Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: WIr haben uns für diese Maschiene entschieden, weil man sowohl eine Kanne Kaffee als auch Latte u.ä. damit zubereiten kann.wir sind damit sher zufrieden. mit etwas übung hat man den dreh schnell raus. mit dem milchschäumer muss man wirklich etwas üben.punktabzug gibt es nur bei der verarbeitung des gerätes es dampft aus manchen ritzen und sieht auch an den griffen etwas billig verarbeitet aus. aber für den preis ganz ok.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: We've had one of these for about 3 months now. Prior to this we only ever used cheap simple filter designs. I was replacing those so often I decided to spend just a little more and see how it goes.The filter side of the machine is pretty standard. I like the pull out drawer design and the ease with which you can fill it with water. The drawer does seem a little cheap and plasticky but I can't complain at the price and it seems solid enough still after 3 months. I do tend to spill lots of drops of coffee from the jug supplied (and water when using it to fill it beforehand). Maybe that's just me, since I seem to do that whichever jug I've ever had.. The coffee itself is fine. I'm surprised at the comment that said they returned the machine because the coffee was too weak. I'd say that I use less coffee per pot than in the past with other machines else it's too strong. Although admittedly, this might use a smaller jug, which would explain that.Where the machine shines, is the espresso side. We were expecting to use it somewhat rarely. Probably not daily and certainly not the multiple times a day we find ourselves using it right now. Personally I find it easier to make a good quality giant coffee using the double sized filter than a regular one with the small one. The smaller ones are more hit and miss getting the right strength. Again, that might just be me.As you'll see from many of the reviews here, the machine does leak a bit. In our experience we tend to get a leak from the espresso outlet rather than the steamer. There is also a fair bit of steam escaping all around the machine, although I'm wondering whether a machine with a steaming function, that doesn't release excess steam, is a realistic goal.Pros: Looks good overall, makes fine coffee both sides, the steamer works fine and is easy to remove and clean, both water entry points are handy.Cons: Leaks here and there. It does feel a bit cheap, for want of a better word. I would not describe the jug as 'easy pour'.Overall, great value for someone who doesn't want to spend several hundred pounds on some of the top quality models out there.

Review Description: Die Maschine ist eine Fehlkonstruktion da beim Filtern des Kaffees aus der  Maschine so viel Wasserdampf austritt das es um die Maschine herum immer nass ist, und das Wasser auf die Heizplatte läuft.Es ist mir unverständlich warum oberhalb des Filters kein kein Austritt für den Wasserdampf geschaffen worden ist, daher sammelt sich die gesamte Feuchtigkeit oberhalb des Filters an und tropft dann ab.Diese Kaffeemaschine würde ich nie wieder kaufen, und kann diese daher auch nicht weiter Empfehlen.

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: I have owned this machine for five months and it has performed faultlessly.  It is used daily for both espresso and filter coffee.  I use ese pods for the espresso part and grind beans for the filter.  The coffee is wonderful and the crema from the espresso part is fantastic.  With a bit of practice the milk frother produces luxuriant velvety milk for cappuccinos .  Some of the other reviews mention that the machine generates a lot of steam but I have not found this.  Compared to a kettle for instance it produces very little.  I also read a review that said it took 20mins for filter coffee but in my experience a full jug of filter is produced in under ten minutes and you can "steal" a cup in a couple of minutes. Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: We wanted a machine that does both espresso and filter coffee, and this is one of the few on the market. Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)

Product Title: DeLonghi BCO411.B 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA)
Review Description: After reading all the great reviews, I was so looking forward to making filter coffee with this machine.Firstly, it's a lot bigger than anticipated but looks good and feel sturdy & fairly heavy.The opening action of the filter basket is nice and sits firmly on the lid of the glass.I primarily bought this as a filter coffee maker - only rarely drinking espresso. But thought it would be a nice add-on feature to have.So I tried making some filter coffee (with ground coffee I know well and have used many times before).Coffee was produced very quickly but surprisingly I detected very little "coffee aroma" in the kitchen. And when I tasted it, I knew why...It had a scalding hot & incredibly weak taste. Which can only mean that the water is heated far far too much and gets filtered through far too quickly. I tried the machine for a whole week - thinking it may take a few times for it to settle in.No luck so I've returned it.

Review Description: La recibí y a los pocos meses, en garantía, dejo de funcionar. La recogió un mensajero y tras dos meses en el sat me la devolvieron"reparada". Le cambiaron la placa electrónica. Product Title: DeLonghi 15-Bar Combi Espresso Coffee Machine, 220-Volts (Not for USA - European Cord), Silver
